summary: The client notified Mike of technical issues that deleted the previous Sprint 1 plan, requesting a new one. Mike proposed a focused Sprint 1 plan including US-006 (Basic Authentication) and US-008 (Supabase Backend Integration) as foundational elements, awaiting approval.

decisions.title: Sprint 1 Scope Proposal
decisions.details: Propose including only US-006 and US-008 to establish secure authentication and backend integration before other features.

actions.task: Save the proposed Sprint 1 plan as SP-001 and initiate execution upon client approval.
Review and approve or tweak the proposed Sprint 1 plan.

backlog_deltas.title: Add US-006 and US-008 to new Sprint 1 plan

risks.risk: Dependencies breaking if non-foundation stories are included early
risks.mitigation: Focus solely on US-006 and US-008 to ensure secure and testable foundation before proceeding.

risks.risk: Scope creep by adding UI or other stories prematurely
risks.mitigation: Keep Sprint 1 code-focused and tight to ~20 minutes execution time; defer wireframes and NFRs.
